description: Night Slugs, the seminal record label focussing on club music from South London and beyond, celebrate their 15th anniversary this year. Join hosts Helix and Bok Bok & a rotating cast of NS friends & family from around the globe monthly.

the-night-slugs-show-10th-january-2024.title: The Night Slugs Show w/ Bok Bok & Lindrum

the-night-slugs-show-10th-november-2023.title: The Night Slugs Show: Helix TKVR w/ Bored Lord, Zim Sinatra & Popstar Benny

the-night-slugs-show-13th-october-2023.title: The Night Slugs Show: Girl Unit with Leonce & River Moon

the-night-slugs-show-15th-september-2023.title: The Night Slugs Show: Helix w/ CalvoMusic, S.Dot, Kade Young & SligkGoHam, Bok Bok w/ Ohjeelo

the-night-slugs-show-8th-december-2023.title: The Night Slugs Show w/ Ronnie Loko, CalvoMusic, Neana & Helix

the-night-slugs-show-zaida-zane-ikonika-.title: The Night Slugs Show w/ Zaida Zane, Ikonika, Helix & Bok Bok

title: The Night Slugs Show
